sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTCADMINISTCODE SET ADMINIST_ZONE_NM = #administZoneNm# , UPPER_ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE = #upperAdministZoneCode# , CREAT_DE = #creatDe# , ABL_DE = #ablDe# , USE_AT = #useAt# , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate , LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE ADMINIST_ZONE_SE = #administZoneSe# AND ADMINIST_ZONE_CODE = #administZoneCode#
